abstract.t: In Massive Data Centers (MDCs), BGP-SPF and similar routing protocols are used to build topology and reachability databases. These protocols need to discover IP Layer 3 attributes of links, such as logical link IP encapsulation abilities, IP neighbor address discovery, and link liveness. The Layer 3 Discovery and Liveness protocol specified in this document collects these data, which are then disseminated using BGP-SPF and similar protocols.
